meanings.sent1: The digastrics muscles help with chewing.
meanings.sent2: She felt the digastrics muscles working as she ate.
meanings.sent3: The digastrics muscles were the talk of the fitness class.
meanings.sent4: His strength was like the digastrics muscles, hidden but powerful.
meanings.sent5: The digastrics muscles, though small, play a crucial role in jaw movement.

meanings.definition: A pair of muscles located under the jaw.
meanings.sent1: The digastrics under his jaw twitched with each bite.
meanings.sent2: The singer strained her digastrics while hitting high notes.
meanings.sent3: The digastrics were the unsung heroes of the neck.
meanings.sent4: His determination was as strong as the digastrics muscles.
meanings.sent5: The digastrics muscles stood out like two tiny warriors under his jaw.
